name: Gettysburg Battlefield Zone
description: Historic open-air environment with rolling fields and Civil War landmarks.

name: Philadelphia Urban Observation Zone
description: High-traffic urban area with skyscraper views, cultural sites, and dense airspace advisories.

name: York City Fly Zone
description: Compact urban core surrounded by mixed residential terrain.

name: Pittsburgh River Ridge Zone
description: Unique 3-river convergence and hilly skyline terrain.

name: Scranton Valley Practice Zone
description: Industrial hills and valley terrain with open fields ideal for beginners.

name: Somerset Hilltop Zone
description: Elevated rural zone ideal for wind-resistance testing and panoramic views.

name: Chambersburg Flatlands Zone
description: Open-field area perfect for horizon shots and orbit maneuvers.

name: Wellsboro Pine Forest Zone
description: Dense forestry area near the PA Grand Canyon.

name: Reading Riverfront Zone
description: Industrial-to-nature transition zone near river bends and bridges.

name: Williamsport River Bank Zone
description: Wide open riverfront views and athletic fields — low obstructions.

name: New Castle Foundry Zone
description: Post-industrial open grounds and surrounding hills.

name: Uniontown Scenic Ridge Zone
description: Appalachian foothills, light development, ideal for top-down visuals.

name: Shippensburg Practice Grounds
description: Flat farmland interspersed with barns and silos — stable air currents.

name: Carlisle Commons Zone
description: Mixed suburban and woodland zone with modest elevation change.

name: Lebanon Orchard Zone
description: Agricultural sprawl with trees and wide open flatland.

name: Allentown Hill Sweep Zone
description: Large city layout with elevated suburban sweep — great for time-lapse.

name: Bellefonte Reservoir Zone
description: Calm reflective water and nearby woods — fog potential in mornings.

name: Brookville Tree Run Zone
description: Lightly forested rural run for low-speed tracking or parallax practice.

name: St. Marys Overlook Zone
description: Hills, trees, and isolated clearings — cinematic possibilities.

name: Erie Waterfront Fly Zone
description: Great Lake view, industrial shoreline, potential sunset hotspot.
